title: Add user profile pictures, about me page, video deletion, and Twitter-style video display

requirements.text: Add a profile picture field to user profiles that stores image data as a Blob

quotes: Add the ability to have profile pictures

acceptanceCriteria: User profile type includes a profilePicture field that can store image bytes
Backend provides a method to upload/update user profile pictures
Backend provides a method to retrieve user profile pictures

requirements.text: Add an 'about me' text field to user profiles for bio/description content
acceptanceCriteria: User profile type includes an aboutMe text field
Backend provides a method to update the about me content
About me field supports multi-line text

requirements.text: Implement backend method to delete team footage videos by video ID, restricted to the video uploader or team leader

quotes: make it so that you can delete videos

acceptanceCriteria: Delete video method requires authentication
Only the user who uploaded the video or the team leader can delete it
Deleted videos are removed from storage and no longer appear in the gallery

requirements.text: Create a profile page displaying user information including profile picture, username, and about me bio
acceptanceCriteria: Profile page is accessible via a route (e.g., /profile or /profile/:userId)
Page displays the user's profile picture if available
Page displays the user's about me text
Current user can edit their own profile picture and about me content

requirements.text: Add profile picture upload component that allows users to select and upload images for their profile, similar to TeamIconUploader

quotes: Add the ability to have profile pictures

acceptanceCriteria: Component accepts standard image formats (PNG, JPG, WebP)
Shows preview of selected image before upload
Validates file size (max 2MB)
Converts image to Uint8Array and uploads via backend

requirements.text: Display team footage videos in Twitter-style card format with poster's profile picture and team icon to the left of the video

quotes: when a video IS posted, its like a tweet, where it has the posters pfp, and team icon to the left of it

acceptanceCriteria: Video cards show the uploader's profile picture on the left side
Video cards show the team icon on the left side
Layout resembles Twitter's tweet card design with media on the right
Video cards display the uploader's username
Cards are styled consistently with the rest of the app's theme

requirements.text: Add delete button to video cards that allows the video uploader or team leader to remove videos

quotes: make it so that you can delete videos

acceptanceCriteria: Delete button appears only for authorized users (uploader or team leader)
Clicking delete shows a confirmation dialog
Successful deletion removes the video from the display
Error messages are shown if deletion fails

requirements.text: Update AppHeader navigation to include a link to the user's profile page
acceptanceCriteria: Profile link appears in the navigation menu when user is authenticated
Link routes to the current user's profile page
Mobile menu includes the profile link

constraints: Maintain single-actor backend architecture with all logic in backend/main.mo
Do not modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity.ts, useInternetIdentity.tsx, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui
Follow existing pattern for image uploads using Uint8Array and ExternalBlob as seen in TeamIconUploader
Maintain consistency with existing authorization patterns for team leaders and members
nonGoals: Public profile pages for other users (focus on own profile only)
Social features like following, liking, or commenting on videos
Profile picture cropping or advanced image editing
